Argument.Name: fqDatatypeName
Argument.Description: The fully qualified path to the XMOM entity

Argument.Name: libraries
Argument.Description: Specifies libraries that service implementations depend on

Argument.Name: registerWithXMOM
Argument.Description: Register the datatype within the XMOM-Database (deprecated and without functionality - all data types will be registered - only present for backward compatibility )

Argument.Name: applicationName
Argument.Description: The name of the application in which the datatype should be replaced.

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: The version name of the application in which the datatype should be replaced.

Argument.Name: xmlFile
Argument.Description: The name of the xml file that should replace the existing datatype definition.

Argument.Name: workspaceName
Argument.Description: The name of the workspace in which the datatype should be replaced.
